GarenQ.name: Decisive Strike
GarenQ.description: Garen removes all slows from himself and gains a burst of Movement Speed. His next attack deals bonus damage and silences his target.

DariusQ.name: Decimation
DariusQ.description: Darius hitches his axe and swings it in a circle. Enemies hit by the blade take more damage than those hit by the handle. Darius heals for a portion of his missing Health based on enemies hit by the blade.

KhazixQ.name: Taste Their Fear
KhazixQ.description: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage is increased against Isolated targets.
